TI
Class BoeBot

java.lang.Object
  TI.BoeBot

public class BoeBot
extends java.lang.Object

The BoeBot class is the main interface to the BoeBot board. It contains methods to do basic GPIO

static boolean digitalRead(int pin)
          Read the state of a pin.
static void digitalWrite(int pin, boolean value)
          Will put a pin in output mode, and set the state high if value is true, and low if value is false If this pin is in input mode, will switch to output mode

          Waits for a pulse on a pin timeout milliseconds

public static void dataStore(int slot,

digitalRead

public static boolean digitalRead(int pin)
Read the state of a pin. If the pin is high, will return true, otherwise will return false

Parameters:
pin - the BoeBot pin number

digitalWrite

public static void digitalWrite(int pin,
                                boolean value)
Will put a pin in output mode, and set the state high if value is true, and low if value is false If this pin is in input mode, will switch to output mode

Parameters:
pin - the BoeBot pin number
value - the value to write to this pin. true will set the pin high, low will set the pin low

pulseIn

public static int pulseIn(int pin,
                          boolean value,
                          int timeout)
Waits for a pulse on a pin timeout milliseconds
